== MOTUMedia has been merged with Debian Multimedia team ==

/!\ '''MOTUMedia team is __no longer active__, so if you are interested in maintaining multimedia packages in both Debian and Ubuntu please consider joining the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~pkg-multimedia-maintainers|Debian Multimedia Maintainers team]]</nowiki>.''' /!\

For more information, please see the <nowiki>[[DebianWiki:DebianMultimedia|Debian Multimedia]]</nowiki>'s home page.

=== Members ===

We are managing members via launchpad: https://launchpad.net/people/motumedia
* Members of MOTUMedia: https://launchpad.net/people/motumedia/+members
* If you want to join, please contact us in #ubuntu-motu first

=== About us ===

MOTU Multimedia was created to maintain multimedia related packages in the ubuntu universe and multiverse. Try to get every package we find in the web to get included into ubuntu's repository where possible. Our goal is to provide YOU with as many multimedia related software as possible. 

Please note that can only adopt packages which we are allowed to redistribute.

If you want to help out, join us in #ubuntu-motu on freenode today!

=== How to help/Ongoing Tasks ===

* Fix bugs assigned to us: https://launchpad.net/people/motumedia/+assignedbugs
* list all multimedia packages we maintain below
* adapt package for clean integration into ubuntu where necessary
* keep packages in the list below in good shape
* discuss further inclusions (please talk at least to one member of MOTUmedia before adding new packages below)
